email_after_4.nudge_text: Could you share your email so we can send you the details?

email_interest.nudge_text: Want me to connect you with our team? Just drop your email address.

email_questions.nudge_text: Looks like you’re exploring quite a bit! Can I send you a quick summary? Share your email below.

email_pause.nudge_text: We’d love to keep you updated. Can you provide your email address?

email_pricing.nudge_text: Before we go further, could you provide your email so we can tailor the next steps?

email_resource.nudge_text: I can share a free resource on this. What’s the best email to send it to?
